description: eBay primarily uses daily call quotas rather than per-second token buckets. Plan batch operations — use bulk endpoints wherever available.

getOrders.note: Very high daily limit. Prefer large page sizes (limit=200) to minimize call count.

createOrReplaceInventoryItem.note: Use bulkCreateOrReplaceInventoryItem for catalog sync — 25x more efficient.

bulkCreateOrReplaceInventoryItem.note: Preferred for catalog sync. Batch 25 items per call. Reduces API calls by 25x vs individual endpoint.

bulkUpdatePriceQuantity.note: Use for price and inventory updates. Much more efficient than individual updateOffer calls.

throttling_behavior.implementation_note: 429s from eBay are rare if you use bulk endpoints and respect daily quotas. Implement a daily call counter per endpoint to catch approaching limits before hitting them.
